events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in software engineer roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the application process.
We completed an initial screening to assess your technical background and experience relevant to the software engineering role.
Thank you for your prompt response to our initial screening questions. Your answers demonstrate strong alignment with our requirements.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC, where you will meet with our software development team.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding ability.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 18th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
Your HR interview went well. The HR team appreciated your professionalism and enthusiasm about working with us.
We have proposed an offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the details carefully and let us know if you have any questions.
You have accepted the job offer. We are excited to welcome you onboard our engineering team and will reach out shortly with onboarding details.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation scheduled and access setup underway for all engineering tools and platforms.
The recruitment process for your position is now complete. Welcome officially to the company, and we look forward to your contributions.
